MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:02pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:37pm on 5th January 2021.
